name: Draw a Stickman: Evil
description:
Draw a Stickman EVIL is an exciting and innovative game that puts a twist on the classic Draw a Stickman formula. While the original game allowed players to create their own hero and guide them through various adventures, Draw a Stickman EVIL lets you play as the enemy and experience the game from a completely different perspective.

In this game, you have the opportunity to choose from a variety of villains, each with their own unique abilities and powers.
